General.Name: OKE Precision Cutting Tools Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: OKE Precision Cutting Tools Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of cemented carbide and CNC cutting tool products. The company offers cutting tools, such as turning, milling, and drilling tools; carbide saw tips for wood, metal, grass, and band applications; and solid carbide saw discs. It also provides other products comprising carbide mould materials, carbide rods, carbide end mill tips for woodworking, carbide scrapers for circular saw blades, carbide finger joint cutters, TC bearings, carbide tips for drill bits, and strips and plates. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Zhuzhou, China.
